Key Match Events: Mena scored the only goal of the match in the 21st minute.
Pulgar received a yellow card in the 44th minute.
Echeverria received a yellow card in the 62nd minute.
Torres and Preciado were also notable players in the match.
Pre-Game Insights: Ecuador was expected to claim a result against a Chile side in disarray after the resignation of their manager.
The match was predicted to be challenging for Chile due to Ecuador's strong defense.
